textTemplates.name: Error_Output_Invocable_Action_Message
textTemplates.text: Close this window and check the order summary page for updated information.

textTemplates.name: Error_Output_No_Delivery_Groups_To_Exchange
textTemplates.text: When an order has items you can exchange, you can find them here.

textTemplates.name: Error_Output_No_Location_Group
textTemplates.text: An exchange must be associated with a location group.

textTemplates.name: Error_Output_No_Webstore_Fault
textTemplates.text: An exchange must be associated with a B2CE or B2B store.

textTemplates.name: Error_Output_Title_No_Webstore_Fault
textTemplates.text: No B2CE or B2B store found.

textTemplates.name: Error_Output_Title_Unmanaged_Order
textTemplates.text: The specified order summary is unmanaged.

textTemplates.name: Error_Output_Title_Wrong_Entity
textTemplates.text: We don't think you meant to come here.

textTemplates.name: Error_Output_Unmanaged_Order
textTemplates.text: You can only run this flow on a managed order summary.

textTemplates.name: Error_Output_Wrong_Entity
textTemplates.text: This is where you'd exchange order products. To exchange order products, start from the order summary page.

textTemplates.name: Header_SelectProductsHeader
textTemplates.text: Select the order products to exchange.

textTemplates.name: Header_SelectProductVariantsHeader
textTemplates.text: Select quantity, reason, and replacement product.

textTemplates.name: Header_SuccessMessage
textTemplates.text: You're all set. The exchange succeeded!

textTemplates.name: Header_WebStoreAndLocationGroupSelectionHeader
textTemplates.text: Select a store and location group.

variables.description: Flag to determine whether we need to show Location Group selection or not.
variables.name: useLocationGroups
